response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This exceptional item is valued at $12,000 by us, reflecting its high quality, unique features, and the time and effort invested into its creation. We believe it could significantly enhance your life or business, bringing you unparalleled benefits. Considering its intrinsic value and the potential it holds, we kindly invite you to consider acquiring this product at the same price of $12,000. We are confident it will be a valuable addition to your collection or operations. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of serving you soon.", "product_price": 12000}
